meanings.definition: Relating to or produced by radiography.
meanings.sent1: The radiographic image showed the broken bone clearly.
meanings.sent2: The doctor ordered a radiographic scan to examine the patient's lungs.
meanings.sent3: The radiographic machine seemed to have a mind of its own, beeping and whirring.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a radiographic light, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The radiographic film captured the intricate details of the butterfly's wings.

meanings.definition: A radiograph or image produced by radiography.
meanings.sent1: The radiographic revealed a hidden tumor in the patient's abdomen.
meanings.sent2: The radiologist examined the radiographic carefully for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The radiographic on the screen looked like a mysterious puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: His memories were like a collection of radiographics, frozen moments in time.
meanings.sent5: The radiographic of the city skyline was breathtaking, capturing every detail.
